name: The Dark Sea (devfirestudio)
description:
Sail your ship through a storm with UNSTABLE winds in The Black Sea, the most dangerous place on the seas. Avoid giant rocks, collect treasures and go as far as you can!

Points

- Go far and collect treasures for more points.
- Points multiply by the ship's speed.
- Make as many points as you can.

Controlls

- Turning the sail:
Click on the sides of the sail to turn it in the same direction

- Rotate the ship:
Click on the sides of the wheel to turn it in the same direction

Assets

https://audionautix.com/ https://opengameart.org/content/thunder-very-close-rain-01 https://opengameart.org/content/rain-long-thunder https://opengameart.org/content/storm-sire

*Sorry english mistakes!
